title.en: A Prayer to Götsang Gönpo Dorje

text.en: Homage to the noble gurus!
text.en-trans: jé lama nam la chaktsal lo

text.en: Upon sun and moon-disc seats at my crown,
text.en-trans: né chitsuk nyidé den teng na

text.en: Sits the glorious guru unmatched in kindness,
text.en-trans: pal kadrin nyammé lama jé

text.en: The sovereign lord and master, Gönpo Dorje—
text.en-trans: jé khyabdak gönpo dorjé la

text.en: To you I pray: hold me in your compassion!
text.en-trans: dak solwa deb so tukjé zung

text.en: Lord, as you remain in unmanifest basic space,
text.en-trans: jé mi ngön ying na zhuk tsana

text.en: You are one with the buddhas in realization,
text.en-trans: gön sangye nam dang gongpa chik

text.en: And equal to the glorious heruka in activity,
text.en-trans: pal heruka dang chöyul nyam

text.en: Mightiest of yogins, foremost among adepts.
text.en-trans: naljor gyi wangchuk drubpé tso

text.en: Lord, as I pray to you with fervent devotion,
text.en-trans: jé khyö la dungwé soldeb na

text.en: Confer the blessings and empowerments of your three secrets.
text.en-trans: sang sum gyi jinlab wangkur tsol

text.en: Shower down a great rain of vajra blessings, here and now,
text.en-trans: dü danta dorjé jin chen pob

text.en: And cause experience and realization to develop in my mind.
text.en-trans: dak gyü la nyamtok kyé du sol

text.en: From the maṇḍala of your form, complete with the three seats,
text.en-trans: ku den sum tsangwé kyilkhor né

text.en: May the vase empowerment serve to ripen my body,
text.en-trans: lü bumpé wang gi minpa dang

text.en: Purify any blockages within my physical channels,
text.en-trans: tsa dö ché dribpa dakpa dang

text.en: And refine my body as the vajra of enlightened form.
text.en-trans: lü ku yi dorjér dak drub dzö

text.en: Lord, from the maṇḍala of your enlightened vajra speech,
text.en-trans: jé sung gi dorjé kyilkhor né

text.en: May the secret empowerment serve to ripen my speech,
text.en-trans: ngak sangwé wang gi minpa dang

text.en: Purify any defects of speech or dynamic wind-energy,
text.en-trans: lung gyur ché ngak gi drima jang

text.en: And refine my voice as the vajra of enlightened speech.
text.en-trans: ngak sung gi dorjér drubpar dzö

text.en: From the maṇḍala of the vajra mind of awareness and emptiness,
text.en-trans: tuk riktong dorjé kyilkhor né

text.en: May the knowledge-wisdom empowerment ripen my mind,
text.en-trans: yi sher yé wang gi minpa dang

text.en: Purify any faults of mind or the emission of subtle essences,
text.en-trans: sem tiklé powé drima jang

text.en: And refine my intellect as the vajra of enlightened mind.
text.en-trans: yi tuk kyi dorjér drubpar dzö

text.en: Lord, from the maṇḍala of your enlightened vajra wisdom,
text.en-trans: jé yeshe dorjé kyilkhor né

text.en: May the realization of the fourth empowerment develop,
text.en-trans: wang zhipé tokpa kyepar dzö

text.en: Purifying any obscurations of the all-ground consciousness,
text.en-trans: künzhi yi dribpa jongwa dang

text.en: And refining my mind as vajra awareness and emptiness.
text.en-trans: sem riktong dorjér drub gyur chik

text.en: Help me to generate intense and longing devotion,
text.en-trans: dé mö kyi dungshuk drak tu kyé

text.en: So that upon the pure ground of ardent veneration,
text.en-trans: mögü kyi sa zhi tsangma la

text.en: The reflection of your wisdom form may arise,
text.en-trans: gön yeshe ku yi zuknyen char

text.en: O protector, and your realization be transmitted.
text.en-trans: tukgyü kyi gongpa powar dzö

text.en: May I always follow the sources of refuge—the guru
text.en-trans: kyab lama könchok nam sum la

text.en: And the Three Jewels—with total trust and reliance.
text.en-trans: yi khyé shé depé taktu nyen

text.en: And no matter what befalls me physically or mentally,
text.en-trans: dak lü sem deduk chi jung yang

text.en: Whether joy or sorrow, may the sublime ones protect me!
text.en-trans: jé dampa nam kyi gön kyob dzö

text.en: Since the sentient beings of the six realms
text.en-trans: madrowa druk gi semchen nam

text.en: Have been my father and mother in the past,
text.en-trans: bu dak gi pamar gyurpé na

text.en: May I be able to free them from the ocean of misery
text.en-trans: dukngal gyi gyatso chenpo lé

text.en: And deliver them to the state of perfect freedom.
text.en-trans: tarpa dampar gö nü shok

text.en: Clearly and steadily visualizing my body as the yidam deity,
text.en-trans: lü yidam lha yi sal nang ten

text.en: With my speech a constant river-like flow of mantra recitation,
text.en-trans: ngakdé jö chuwö zhung tar tsön

text.en: And my mind in the state of self-liberation, Mahāmudrā—
text.en-trans: sem rangdrol chakgya chenpö ngang

text.en: May I strive at all times with unwavering enthusiasm.
text.en-trans: dü taktu yengmé tsönpar shok

text.en: All virtues amassed throughout the three times,
text.en-trans: dü sum du sakpé gé tsok nam

text.en: I mentally gather together and offer to all beings.
text.en-trans: lö chik tu dü né dro la jin

text.en: May each and every one throughout the whole of space
text.en-trans: ma khakhyab semchen malüpa

text.en: Attain the level of this splendid master of the four kāyas.
text.en-trans: pal ku zhi wangchuk tobpar shok

text.en: Mighty lord of siddhas, know me! Care for me!
text.en-trans: jé drubpé wangchuk khyé khyen no

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, this very instant!
text.en-trans: dü danta nyi du jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, in this very place!
text.en-trans: duk sa di nyi du jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, upon this very seat!
text.en-trans: ten tok di nyi du jingyi lob shik

text.en: Guru, crowning ornament of a hundred siddhas,
text.en-trans: lama drub gyé tsukgyen

text.en: Gyalwa Götsangpa Gönpo Dorje, care for me!
text.en-trans: gyalwa götsang pa gönpo dorjé khyen no
